description:
Enjoy modern living and dramatic views of Manhattan from the comfort of your own living room. 

Walk to Fort Greene Park, Downtown Brooklyn, Boerum Hill, Dumbo.  Barclays Center, BAM, Chef's Table at Brooklyn Fare, Century 21, Trader Joe's, Alamo Draft House, Pollo D'Oro, Walter's, Lulu&Po, No. 7...

A/C, 2/3, 4/5, B/F, Q/R, and G trains nearby (1 express stop to Manhattan from Dekalb & Jay St/Metro Tech Stations) 

My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Brooklyn Penthouse *Breathtaking Manhattan Views*
review: Amelia was great! Very responsive before, during and after our stay. The flat was exactly as it looked in the pictures - absolutely stunning!
